idea:
Sitting In Thane Mumbai INDIA , PENTAGON STEEL ENGINEERING -LLP does detail engineering of Steel structures in USA & CANADA with in-depth understanding & know how about framing, loading & steel design.  

Unless we submit the drawings NO Steel fabrication of C/L’s & Beams & Truss & Frames will happen in USA OR CANADA.  

We also give expertise How to erect a Beam or a C/L from which angle & which floor by using 3D Technology & BIM ( Building Information Management) Compliant solutions. 

This way General Contractors & Steel Fabrication Companies rely on us to give accurate 3D Model & Drawings …WITHOUT which NO Construction or Erection of Building is Possible. 

We have done Many High Rises, Schools, Hospitals, Malls, Industrial Structures, Oil Refineries Parts & currently also involved in many Prestigiuos projects like Intel Buildings, Tiger Woods Foundation etc…ect… 

What we do is combination is Innovative engineering services which help reducing costs by expediting the Projects Lifecycle by 20% to 30% across all type of Commercial, Industrial & Public Sector Projects.  

  

Scalability is dependent on many factors …major is INFUSION of funds. IF there is NO TAX…that saved money can be invested back in business to scale up resources from 15 to 50 in 2 to 3 years. 

  

PENTAGON STEEL ENGINEERING -LLP started with 7 resources in July 2019…by January we shall be 14 resources by March 2020. 

Focus is to be 25 resources by December 2020 if we save tax that money we can invest to train resources & scale up operations. 

We want to be a 50 Strong resource company by 2022 & if taxes are exempted we can invest in creating Intellectual Property by creating tools & designing algorithms on specialized software in Construction Detailing industry.
name: PENTAGON STEEL ENGINEERING LLP

idea: One Investor aims to invest pocket change amounts in budding startups that go through a thorough vetting process, thereby connecting youthful investors to startups, charging zero fees.
name: One Investor

idea:
YTMR is a Network Centric Independent B2B Manufacturers Sales Representative Company, which provides B2B sales and marketing services to manufacturers or suppliers in INDIA.

“It is impossible to know everything, however, the more resources you have the deeper your knowledge!

YTMR has the resources and the desire to work with manufacturers or suppliers to increase their sales and geographic market expansion. We typically handle a sales team for competitive and non-competitive product lines to work on your behalf to generate and close sales deals. working under a contractual arrangement within the defined geographic territory on an exclusive basis within the assigned field of responsibility.
name: YTMR SOURCING LLP

idea:
BridgeLabz is solving the tech employability challenge by giving hands-on experience to fresh engineers. With co-learning spaces in Mumbai and Bangalore, BridgeLabz provides a live environment where fresh engineers learn coding from scratch. BridgeLabz is the first organization to claim 100% guaranteed job placement to engineers on emerging technologies. Most importantly we do not charge anything from engineers.

BridgeLabz thus provides this custom-trained talent to tech companies based on their specific tech landscape requirements. BridgeLabz takes the risk of a bad hire, also our engineers are productive from day one.

The tech talent is paid for by the mandating organizations so it is a client paid model. The talent is recruited using a hackathon process and is the groomed in the mandated tech stack for 16 weeks. After these 16 weeks, engineers are deployed to the tech company.

It has partnered with over 200 companies, including Yatra, Capgemini, Meru Cabs, LafargeHolcim, JDA, Urban Ladder, Fullerton India and RBL bank. It has successfully made 800+ engineers employable to date.
name: BRIDGELABZ SOLUTIONS LLP
